channel.title: The Trouble with Travis
channel.description: Recent content on The Trouble with Travis

item.title: Annual Albums
item.description: Introduction Since 2014 I’ve been keeping a chronicle of albums. This is typically music that I find during that year, or that was relevant to me in some way personally. This page serves as a chronicle of those albums so the songs are not lost. As a rule, album titles and songs are locked after the year’s end. Annual Albums Pathfinder (2025) Fruit Bat - Of Monsters and Men Road Regrets - Dan Mangan The Blue, The Green - Lonely The Brave Open Passageways - All Them Witches Money Game, Pt.

item.title: Fuck Wells Fargo
item.description: Once upon a time, I was very young. I got a job. That job asked me to get a bank so they could deposit their checks directly to me. Young, independent, and so very sure of myself I walked into a Wells Fargo. They opened a checking account for me, and everything was fine. The job didn’t last long. I counted every penny as every penny was precious. So it was really weird when I checked my account and it was over drafted by $100 dollars.

item.title: ...but why?
item.description: Like most things, this all started to see if I could. See, I’d had this idea for The Trouble with Travis a long time ago. It would be a blog space, where I’d explore (and probably fumble a bit) through some writings and just get it out there. See where it lead. But there were several problems with how I’d set it up. Well, not problems exactly. It was cumbersome. Wordpress was heavy for what I wanted to do.
